description:
Sakata is bored during vacation and Big Bro tells him he has booked a stay at a hotel.
Sakata wonders where they’ll be staying at, but it turns out it’s... Ashibe’s house?!
Big Bro is so happy to be spending the night with Goma-chan, but Sakata is not having nearly as much fun...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ゴマちゃんホテルへようこそ!
